Labour MP Ginny Andersen reshares King Charles, Christopher Luxon quip on Instagram https://www.nzherald.co.nz/lifestyle/labour-mp-ginny-andersen-reshares-king-charles-christopher-luxon-quip-on-instagram/JJODWEBI6RABFF65SXSTU3GZLE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/lifestyle/labour-mp-ginny-andersen-reshares-king-charles-christopher-luxon-quip-on-instagram/JJODWEBI6RABFF65SXSTU3GZLE/ Tom Rose'Showing his king*ssy ... like that is just crazy.' Sun, 27 Oct 2024 03:25:50 +0000 Labour MP Ginny Andersen reshared a post which made an explicit reference regarding an outfit King Charles wore at the Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting in Samoa. Photos / Mark Mitchell, @christopherluxon

Photo / S Curtis
